text: @realDonaldTrump Read this article, especially if you are demanding we re-open. The world as we know it no longer exists. We are not going back to normal. Our top concern now is safety, food and shelter. Accepting this reality is necessary if we are going to survive this. https://t.co/U6znTB4fUR
